info.title: UniConnect API Documentation
info.description:
Welcome to the UniConnect API documentation! **UniConnect** is more than just a platform; it's a vibrant community designed to enhance the lives of university students. Our mission is simple: to provide students with a convenient and efficient way to buy, sell, or trade used textbooks, stationery, and other study materials. With UniConnect, you have the power to connect with fellow students and support each other on your academic journey.


## About UniConnect

### Connecting Students, Building Community

UniConnect is not just a marketplace; it's a place where students come together based on their needs and preferences. We believe in fostering a sense of community among students, creating an environment where you can find the materials you need and help others by passing on what you no longer require.

### Sustainability and Environmental Impact

At UniConnect, we are committed to making a positive impact on the environment. By promoting the reuse of study materials, we contribute to sustainability efforts and help reduce waste on university campuses. Our platform is a win-win for both students and the planet.

### Simplifying Student Life

In essence, UniConnect is here to simplify the process of buying and selling study materials for students. We provide affordable options, facilitate connections, and encourage a spirit of community. Join us in making student life more accessible, environmentally conscious, and enjoyable.

We're excited to have you on board and explore the UniConnect API. Let's work together to support students, build connections, and create a brighter, more sustainable future.

Welcome to UniConnect!

### Getting Started:
  Explore the comprehensive API documentation below to integrate seamlessly with UniConnect. Whether you're a developer, partner, or enthusiast, this documentation rovides the necessary information to interact with UniConnect's API and unlock its full potential.

externalDocs.description: Find out more about UniConnect here

post.description: Uploads user profile image and sends an activation email.

201.description: User created successfully. Activation email sent.

400.description: Invalid request data or image upload failed.

post.description: Activates a user account using an activation token.

400.description: Invalid activation token or user already exists.
Invalid request data or user not found.

get.description: Retrieve user information for the authenticated user.
Log out the authenticated user by clearing the token.

put.description: Update user information such as name, email, and phone number.

400.description: Invalid request data or password mismatch.

addressType.example: Robert Robertson, 1234 NW Bobcat Lane, St. Robert, MO 65584-5678

delete.description: Delete a user address by ID.

400.description: Invalid request data or old password incorrect.

get.description: Retrieve user information by user ID.
Retrieve information about all users. (Admin access only)

delete.description: Delete a user by ID. (Admin access only)

put.summary: Update the last message in a conversation

get.summary: Get all messages with conversation ID
Get all orders of a user
Get all orders of a seller

put.summary: Update order status for a seller
